title: Breath of life
creator_credit: Queensland. Dept. of Education and Arthur E Jenks
brief_description: Demonstrates mouth-to-mouth resuscitation, with emphasis on four points of procedure. Shows how mouth-to-mouth resuscitation can be used effectively in cases of drowning, electric shock, and obstruction in the throat.
